definition: old town/old district of a city

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: We strolled through the old town and watched a very old house being demolished.
sentences.chinese: 我們在老城閒逛，看到了被拆毀的一座很古老的房子。

sentences.english: There are wonderful old towns, castles and museums to visit.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有很讚的老城鎮，城堡和博物館供你參觀。

sentences.english: Albufeira Old Town encompasses the historical points of interest in the area.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾布費拉老城包括在該地區利益的歷史點。

sentences.english: This is the old urban Changting.
A natural starting point for a tour of Warsaw is the Old Town.
sentences.chinese: 華沙的遊覽自然應該從老城區開始。

sentences.english: They walked through the tortuous streets of the old city.
sentences.chinese: 他們步行穿過老城區中心彎彎曲曲的街道。

sentences.english: The site is located in a crossroads in a historical district in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 基地位於廣州市老城區的一個十字街口。

sentences.english: Christmas decorations glow in the old town of Vienna, Austria.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕裝飾燈染紅了整個奧地利維也納的老城區。

sentences.english: The Israelis had opened a tunnel that ran under the Temple Mount in Jerusalems Old City.
sentences.chinese: 以色列在耶路撒冷老城的聖殿山開通了一條隧道。

sentences.english: They drove through the housing projects to the historic district.
sentences.chinese: 他們開過保障房區到老城區。

sentences.english: Zhouqiao Old Street was once the center of the old city of Jiading.
sentences.chinese: 州橋老街曾是嘉定老城的中心。

sentences.english: The Old City was also the cradle of Catholicism in Shanghai and in China.
sentences.chinese: 老城廂還是上海和中國天主教的發源地。

sentences.english: Railroad Town god's temple in Shanghai and Yiyuan Shopping is such a place.
sentences.chinese: 上海老城廂內的城隍廟和豫園，便是這樣的一個地方。

sentences.english: Residents bustle through Cairo's Old City.
sentences.chinese: 市民匆匆忙忙走在開羅的老城區。

sentences.english: Viborg is a city in Denmark.
sentences.chinese: 維堡，位於丹麥，是一座擁有悠久歷史的老城鎮。

sentences.english: The old city is increasingly disfigured by tasteless new buildings.
sentences.chinese: 這座老城的市容越來越多地被庸俗的新建築物破壞了。

definition: Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
